Why did the orange cat sit on the computer?

Because it wanted to keep an eye on the mouse!

Float Right

Why did the big dog gently sniff the little dog's nose while it was lying down?.

Because he wanted to remind the little pup that even the smallest noses can make the biggest difference in a friendship!
